item.title: Taiwan Stock Market Data Product - From Crawling and ETL to API & Dashboard Services"
item.description: Product Architecture Figure 1 Product Architeture. Data Engineering Under distributed architecture - Dockre swarm - Docker Portainer, using Python, Airflow, rabbitMQ, flower, and celery, to collect the daily data from Taiwan Stock Exchange, Taipei Exchange, and Taiwan Futures Exchange. Using docker, fast API to set up RESTful API service. Using docker swarm to set up distributed service, including web crawler, API, MySQL database, and RabbitMQ. Using Cloud service - Linode, to manage multiple distributed machines.
